name: Amazonian Clay 16-Hour Full Coverage Foundation
about: What it is:An iconic foundation just got an upgrade with 46 new shades and an improved oil-free formula for up to 16-hours of lightweight, full-coverage, matte foundation..Coverage:Full.Finish:Matte.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Amazonian Clay: Acts as nature's most perfect ingredient for better, longer, truer wear..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, sulfates SLS & SLES, and triclosan. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This foundationu2019s skin-mimicking full coverage never cakes or creases and has a soft-matte, never-flat finish that smooths and blurs. Just a dot of the whipped-mousse texture blends seamlessly, while the poreless technology erases the look of pores, fine lines, and wrinkles. Love the original 12-hour formula? Re-match yourself using the shade guide or try one to two shades deeper for your new shade! Amazonian clay acts as nature's most perfect ingredient for better, longer, truer wear with a lightweight feel and matte finish..Clinical Results:In a consumer panel study based on 32 subjects:
ingredients: -Amazonian Clay: Acts as nature's most perfect ingredient for better, longer, truer wear...Cyclopentasiloxane, Water/Aqua/Eau, Isododecane, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Polysilicone-11, PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Magnesium Sulfate, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Sodium Citrate, Fragrance/Parfum, Tocopheryl Acetate, C24-28 Alkyl Methicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Kaolin, Dipropylene Glycol, Silica, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol, Tocopherol, Amyl Cinnamal, Linalool. (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Step 1: Apply your favorite moisturizer and SPF..-Step 2: Add a few light dots of product evenly on the face..-Step 3: Use the buffer brush (or fave complexion brush) to buff and blend product. Wait one to two minutes as formula adjusts before applying anything on top.

reviews.review_title: New formula ruined a once perfect foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Formula changed and quality is very bad now. This used to be my holy grail foundation. Then they changed the formula. It's really sketch to completely change a products ingredients and formulation but continue to market it under the same name. It's no longer clean at Sephora, it no longer has SPF and I see no similarities between what it is now and what it used to be. Now it literally feels like I'm spreading acrylic paint all over my face. It oxidizes within the hour, streaks and doesn't dry. Tarte ruined a once amazing product and they've lost me as a customer. I also find it hugely unethical that older, positive reviews left for the original formula are still up and listed under the new re-formulated (and crappy) product. Not cool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I (F27) have been using this foundation for the past 9 yearsu2013 it had been my go-to with it's SPF and oil-free feature for my acne prone skin (as a teenager). Not to mention how long the bottle would last me. About 1.5 years ago I replenished with another bottle and just 12 months ago began spotting weird white heads/red areas around my mouth. This has continued for the past year spreading over my face in various different locations. After a chat with my dermatologist it turned out to be a type of stubborn contact dermatitis. I tried replacing face washes, bronzers, mosturizers, laundry detergent and even went on antibiotics to try and solve the issue. I never thought to try a new foundation because I had been using this forever and was loyal to it. After researching, it appeared that Tarte decided to start adding unneccessary fragrance to this product and I am devastated I can no longer use it. Luckily, my skin has cleared up since I stopped using it and I HIGHLY discourage anyone with sensitive skin to try this!!! I have attached photos below that spread over an 8 month span and just show you an example of what this did to my face. There are much better options out there for sensitive skin. It's not worth the risk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m 42, I have some fine lines and some not-so fine ones, have combination skin and I break out easily.  Iu2019ve been using this product for a couple of years now and I love it.  Stays on all day, doesnu2019t settle into fine lines and has no noticeable scent. It settles into the less fine lines -because itu2019s not magic, but one can hide those with setting powder.  This product doesnu2019t make me break out.  Additionally, one tube lasts me about six months with daily application. The product is thick, so itu2019s best to use a very small amount over at least moisturizer (works even better over primer too).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this foundation but switched to their sugar rush poreless tinted moisturizer (recommended). The shade for me was still the same but I was not impressed with the overall look or wear of the foundation. I think it actually lasts less time and while I am oily, extra in the summer, I tried this a few days with different primers and I had breakthrough sooner than usual. After less than a week i also have a breakout all over my face and nothing else has changed except the foundation. Going back. Sad it used to be so much better and that's the general consensus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stayed away from this line for so long because of all the bad word of mouth. I decided to give it a try because I tend to like products that arenu2019t the most buzzy. It was perfect for my textured, combo skin, which needs a thicker formula for a smoothing effect. Donu2019t let its consistency upon release from the tube scare you. I used a drugstore silicone primer and buffed this in nicely with a dome-shaped foundation brush and it looked beautiful. Blended more easily than some of the most expensive foundations. Stayed on even in my oily areas that seem to not be able to hold onto anything. Did not feel dry on my cheeks at all. Nice undertone options to choose from for medium-depth range but canu2019t speak for the lighter or deeper ends of the range. Donu2019t love that it has fragrance (but itu2019s pretty negligible and hasnu2019t bothered my skin) and no SPF. Give it a try before you decide!

Then a few years ago I think, they changed the formula. Now it smells different and feels different and blends different. At first I thought my skin had changed but then I found an old tube of my old formula and compared them. This new formula is more chocky or drying or something sits on my skin. But it still doesn't make me break out so use it mixed with face oil and it goes on nicer that way. I'll use it up but won't buy again. It might work really well for oily skin. Or people looking for a powder finish! Also might work for someone with sensitive skin because the new formula still not giving me any issues with reactions.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 20N Light Neutral - light skin with a balance of warm & cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have stupid, difficult skin. It's ruddy, super sensitive, strangely fair at the same time, and is an immense pain in the posterior to find coverage for. It likes to flip flop between perfectly fine, to lol you get to look like a steamed lobster today. I have NEVER found a full coverage foundation that does what I need. On a whim, I stopped by my local Sephora, and spent some time trying to color match. I narrowed it down to this brand and this shade, specifically for the clay aspect and the total coverage offered. And by the grace of my Irish Appalachia born ancestors, it WORKED. The shade covered the red entirely, without looking caked and looked surprisingly natural. I didn't even need that much, to achieve the coverage necessary for my temperamental skin. It lasted well past my work shift, and didn't break me out. I have skin on the dry side, so I definitely had to put a reasonably heavy moisturizer prior to use in order to avoid a couple of patches on my face that looked dry. Overall, the foundation didnu2019t look dry on my face, even when I tried it for the first time and didnu2019t heavily moisturize (except for a couple of small areas). Perhaps if you have oily or combo skin you would have a different experience. What I liked most about this foundation is that it was breathable and didnu2019t feel like I had full coverage foundation on. It looked like my own skin, but better. While Iu2019ve tried foundations with more coverage, this one would suit my needs since I just want my skin to look better, with a balance of being lightweight. I feel like the description of the shades lean a little lighter than what Iu2019m accustomed to, so just be aware of that when choosing a shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to foundation for probably 4+ years! I keep 34B medium beige and 22S light sand, and mix the two for my perfect shade depending on the time of year. Right now in December, Iu2019m probably doing a 4:1 ratio of 24S to 34B, but in the summer I can pretty much wear 100% 34B (I wear sunblock and big hats, but I work outside and always seem to catch some sun no matter what lol). I also use 100% 22S under my eyes and on my cheekbones as a subtle highlight.   I have combination skin that can get very dry and flaky. This foundation is perfect, it feels semi matte. If I need more matte, I just brush on some translucent powder in those areas. I never seems to dry out my skin, and it doesnu2019t settle into my creases or get cruddy. If you have oily skin and donu2019t set with a powder or something, it may not wear as well. If you have very dry skin, moisturize well before application and do not set with powder. I change my approach based on the area of my face and how my skin is feeling that day, and this foundation easily adapts!   I have a really great skincare routine, and I tend to not have trouble with blemishes. I also do not wear makeup for very long, extended periods/during rigorous activity. So I cannot say if this is going to be enough coverage for everyone, or if it will last through an 18 hour shift of bartending. I will say, the times Iu2019ve fallen asleep in my makeup after a late date with hubby, Iu2019ve woken up the next morning still looking very pretty. And Iu2019m not ashamed to say, I have just touched up my slept-in makeup and gone to early doctors appointments Iu2019m running late for the next day. I typically look pretty much like the night before! So, thereu2019s that haha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation!  I received it and the airbrush foundation brush in the mail and had to try it immediately.  This was the fastest and smoothest application of a full coverage foundation I have probably ever had.  Normally my makeup sets into my pores and laugh lines,  but not this foundation.  I used a setting spray after application and it stayed on smoothly for over 8 hours! I will definitely buy this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Amazonian Clay 16-Hour Full Coverage Foundation by Tarte! It goes on very smooth with easy application and stays on all day. It covers my imperfections well and has a nice texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation! I received free samples in shades 51S (deep sand) & 56S (rich sand) with the buffer foundation brush. This is one of the first foundations Iu2019ve ever used that has given me the best coverage without any additional products. This foundation is so smooth & creamy. It blended with my skin perfectly & gave me a beautiful matte finish. It lasts for a long time & a little goes a long way. The buffer foundation brush is AMAZING!  Every time I used it, it blended the foundation flawlessly with my skin. After trying these, I definitely will be switching my foundation. The Amazonian Clay 16 hour foundation & The Buffer are a game changer! I highly recommend trying it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 44S Tan Sand - 44S tan sand
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I got two shades and 44s is my color! I was so excited to see how well it match. I am a light skin black woman. Our exact shades tend to be harder to find .. some foundations are either to pink or orange. Anywho I normally wear Fenty in a shade 300 and this would definitely be my second choice. It has a soft matte finish. Beautiful touch.  I was sent this for a review, but I would definitely purchase with my on money.

reviews.review_title: Treat Your Skin to a Flawless and Natural Glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many foundations that have promised to give me full coverage while providing a smooth look that lasts for hours. Yet Iu2019m left disappointed only for it to fail halfway through the day. Failure is not an option with Tarteu2019s Amazonian Clay 16-Hour Full Coverage Foundation. I no longer have to worry about my makeup not lasting. What Works best is to start with a fresh clean face and apply a moisturizer before it sets. I start my foundation before my face is dry so it prevents the cake look and makes blending easier. Tartes Amazonian Clay Foundation is very light with a mouse like formula that is buildable. I recommend using a small amount to start as a base. Then as needed You can build up to your desired coverage. I like how this foundation matches well with my skin tone. I used 27S light-medium sand (light to medium skin with warm, golden undertones) which evened it out.  The pores on my nose are reduced and gives my skin an overall smooth natural look. Blending the foundation with the brush into the skin from the center out to the hairline is a must to avoid streaks and patches. Itu2019s time to let your foundation out wear you and give Tarte Amazonian Clay 16-hr Full Coverage a try because failing just isnu2019t an option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Would definitely recommend. It is everything that it says it is. Full coverage, 16 hour wear. The best part is that it doubles as a concealer also.  I will be purchasing this product when it runs out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I have tried that actually stays on for the full day. Itu2019s definitely long lasting wear. This is great when will be out for long periods of time and donu2019t have time for a touch up. It has great coverage and texture. I would definitely buy this product and add it to my make up collection. You can wear this everyday or save it for those special date nights and be picture ready. Very high quality product for a good price. I highly recommend this to friends and family. I did notice that if you have combo skin or oily skin, a matte finish or prep should be used because I noticed shine after about 8 hours of wear, but thatu2019s still a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My face has never looked so flawless, the product goes on so smooth and has great coverage. Love the brush too must have foundation itu2019s my new go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a promotional item. I was sent three shades 18B,  20B, 26B. I went with 26B Light Medium Beige. It matched great. At first the foundation goes on great but as the hours pass I do feel it changing. It starts to break up around my mouth and nose. It does transfer on hands and anything else. Some benefits are that it is full coverage. I do apply it as they recommend with finger tips and then blend with their brush which I did receive along with the foundation. That was a huge plus for me. I go for a full coverage foundation normally that is semi matte or matte. I did need to set this with a powder which I don't like doing because that tends to make my face extra dry later on. I wouldn't buy this product and I would not recommend to a friend unless it was only worn for maybe 5 hours at a time. The lasting power is not really there for me.  I love the first 5 hours after that not so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was not my exact match so Iu2019ll need to try another shade. The formula is thick but goes on smooth and fills pores and results in a matte look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tarte Amazonian Clay 16-hour full coverage foundation is a great product! The coverage was fantastic and it blended very well to my skin. I have a little bit of redness in my cheeks and it covered it. There were no streaks and it looked great even after a long workday. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_title: Must have for the make up bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complete coverage with out the weight. A def must have for your make up bag.  Def recommend it to anyone looking for an all day full coverage wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this is THE best foundation I have ever used! Tarte products have never let me down and this product does not disappoint! A little goes a long way and has great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Provides full, non greasy coverage with a soft pleasant odor. Lasts the entire day without rubbing off. Covered scarring and redness with ease! Provides a full matte coverage very well!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to try the Tarte Amazonian Clay 16 hour foundation. I have to say this foundation is the best Iu2019ve tried. It makes me look flawless and the color is spot on! I love how itu2019s an easy application and that it last sooooo long! I definitely recommend this to anyone and everyone. So far all the females I have told has went out and bought this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decided to try this product as I suffer from roscea and I need a full coverage foundation. It does a good job at covering but my redness. I would not recommend for someone with dry skin unless pairing with a good moisturizer. On days when I need more coverage this is one of my top 3 foundations I will reach for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The tan sand shade matches my skin tone perfectly and it was easy to use. Doesn't become patchy and applies very smoothly. It has a nice clay scent as well which I noticed after taking it out of the tube. The brush that came with it made the application much easier. It stayed on for 10 hours without requiring any touch ups. I received this product for free in exchange of my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use the previous Amazonian Clay and loved it. This newer formula is terrible. It does not blend and sits on top of my skin it almost feels greasy. The color is also terrible and does not translate to what I normally use. I really do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Compared to other full coverage foundations I've used, I would not say that this particular brand/product really fulfilled its purpose. Using the included brush, I found the finish to be patchy and not successful in covering my acne or dark spots. Perhaps I would have had better success with a shade closer to my actual skin tone. It did dry matte, which I like, but did not make my face feel dehydrated.

reviews.review_title: If you like full-coverage foundation, check it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation to test for my feedback.   This foundation has a very smooth formula and a little bit does go a long way. It came with a bamboo brush that was wonderful for a flawless application, and using that brush really did provide an airbrush appearance. And the coverage was really good.   The reason I did not rate this 5-stars was due to the shade. It really was not a match, so I truly couldnu2019t evaluate it fully. I could possibly use it as a concealer or as a highlighter but it could not be used as a full face foundation for me. And that makes me sad because itu2019s a great formula with great coverage and it wears very well.   So, if youu2019re able to find the shade for you (I definitely recommend testing it in person. I donu2019t really think the pictures of the foundation represent what they will look like in person), I would recommend trying this foundation, especially if youu2019re a fan of full-coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Tarte foundation free from Bzzagent/Tarte in exchange for an unbiased review. I really like this Amazonian clay foundation! i have dry skin and sometimes matte foundations can be too drying, but this one leaves my skin plump yet matte. I also found it covered up fine lines even though it was matte. And it also easily covered redness with just a thin layer. I applied by using my fingers to roughly  dot foubdation on my face and the used the Tarte foundation brush to buff it all in to a flawless finish. i liked this so much i even used it as the foundation for my wedding! it looked great in photos

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh WOW! I loved Tarte Amazonian clay 16-hour foundation. My skin I dry so I always struggle with foundations, especially full coverage. This one was flawless, smooth, and hydration. I had no crease, and I wore it for 2 Christmas parties each for around 5 hours, and got ready hours before and I came home still perfectly. I am not going to buy anything else ever. The brush was terrific too and I didn't need to dampen the brush. The result is matt skin, smooth, no shine, and natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how smoothly it applied to my skin making it look so flawless. I didn't experience any cakey spots and my skin stayed matte. My makeup stayed on all day and by the time I was ready to wash it off my makeup still looked fabulous. I definitely liked using the brush with this foundation. I still have to try it with a a beauty sponge but so far I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tired out the Tarte Amazonian clay 16-hour full coverage foundation 14N ivory (fair skin with a balance of warm & cool neutral undertones). It blended perfectly with my face leaving my skin looking flawless and absolutely stunning! This is my favorite foundation now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tarte clay full coverage foundation is a very effective foundation for a skin types. It's great for health conscious people like myself, it is formulated without harsh ingredients; parabens, phthalates, etc. I love how the foundation blurs out every imperfection on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! It feels amazing on my skin while providing the coverage that I need! I will absolutely be purchasing again!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this project. It gives amazing coverage as it's super thick. A little goes a long way so you will not run through the product super fast. The application is super easy and goes on very smooth. I loveee the  brush that comes with as it makes the application flawless.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 37S Medium-Tan Sand - medium to tan skin with warm, golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tarte Amazonian Clay 16 hour full coverage foundation does cover all my dark spot and redness. While it makes my imperfections become less apparent, it is too thick. Iu2019ve never had a foundation this thick. On the skin it feels like I have a mask on. There is a scent to the foundation but it does not bother me. I use this foundation when I need very full coverage for a night out. It looks better in the night like when going to clubs or dinner because in plain daylight you will see that you have foundation on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is awesome, The coverage is amazing with using very little product. It goes on smooth, leaves skin feeling moisturized, and does not get cakey throughout the day.  I love that coverage is buildable if needed and my skin looked amazing all day! I will definitely buy this again and recommend it to my friends and family!

reviews.review_title: I really want to like this foundation ud83dude14
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this foundation, but unfortunately I didnu2019t. I followed my usual skin prep using moisturizer and primer before applying the foundation. That did very little to help with how dry and cakey the foundation looked after I applied it. I have combination skin and tend to get oily in my t-zone area so itu2019s very unusual for me to have any dryness. I had to go over with a thin layer of my usual foundation and use a hydrating setting spray for it to look decent. I tried using it by switching up my skin prep technique a few times but the results were always pretty much the same.  The brush was very nice to use however. Itu2019s possible thatu2019s this foundation may be ideal for persons with extremely oily skin and it does stay put for the 16hrs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the fact you can build up this coverage all the way to full coverage and it gives even skin tone. I also like that tart is cruelty free. It blends well and doesnu2019t leave a cakey look and it definitely lasted all day. I also love the blending brush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of this foundation. It's light on the skin and buildable if you have areas that need extra attention. I have slight discoloration in spots across my cheeks and it blended and made everything match super well. As far as application, I used the brush but wasn't as big of a fan as using my damp sponge egg, so that was my main way of applying the product. Since it's winter I'm not sure how it holds up to heavy sweating, but when I'd transition in to the warmth from the freezing cold outside, it didn't run off my face even though my forehead got a bit damp. I'll be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: me gusta porque es perfecta para piel grasa. no cubre mucho las pequitas de mi rostro pero  se ve bien en la piel. se ve natural como una segunda piel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a really hard time finding the right foundation. Not only shade but overall blending and helping with the appearance of pores. I've tried other Tarte foundations and this one is by far the best. It's not heavy, there is a very consistent look and smooth feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy to have received two tarte makeup foundations they are very buildable and easy to apply, they have a very nice matte finish. I have used other tarte brand foundations and they are all very good, I also received a foundation brush and it is amazing, I like that the packaging has bamboo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re looking for a full coverage foundation this is it. It doesnu2019t feel heavy but it does not give off natural. If still blends out nicely and has a nice finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Talk about full coverage! I love this formula! A little definitely goes a long way.The only thing I would suggest is that a good primer and moisturizer be used. I had a couple of dry spots that showed up when I didn't properly moisturize. Other than that, it's an amazing formula that goes on evenly and covers very well. If you have oily skin, this foundation is definitely for you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 34B Medium Beige - medium skin with cool, pink or rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! There are so many skin tones and I found a product that works amazing for me. True full coverage, that doesnu2019t leave my face feeling oily or cakey after wearing all day. Perfect for a mom on the go!

reviews.review_title: great for coverage, horrible for texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: if you have great skin, this might be a good option for you. i personally have a lot of texture, and even in areas where its not as bad, the foundation amplifies it. i wouldnu2019t recommend this for dry skin at all since the foundation is drying and makes the skin appear flaky. the only good thing i can say is that it has impeccable coverage and covers redness/discoloration very well!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 22S Light Sand - light skin with warm, golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was kind of hard to blend on my oily, acne prone skin as I felt that the formula is dry. I feel like after trying to blend it on my face, there were some patchy areas. It did cover some of my discoloration but not fully.

reviews.review_title: Great full time coverage with a smooth finish!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I was pleasantly surprised at how great this product worked. I received this shad and mahogany neutral to try and while mahogany may be my summer color it was definitely too dark for winter but worked great for contouring. The full coverage of the foundation did well to cover my dark spots and I didnu2019t have to use a lot to achieve the coverage I was looking for and was able to avoid use of concealers to pre-cover the dark areas, which saved me a good amount of time. The product went on smoothly using the photo finish foundation brush and gave me the appearance of having a good tan (an even glow). I didnu2019t get in 16hours of wear during the past few weeks, but will say it held up well after 12hrs and dancing the night away at a wedding so Iu2019m a fan. I would recommend this product but would say go to the store to test the shades as they are not what your shade may be with other brands.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 32N Medium Neutral - medium skin with a balance of warm & cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I guess this foundation had a formula update because I don't dislike it anymore. I'm pleasantly surprised. This is a thick, mousse-y, full coverage foundation. A little goes a very long way. It's not spackle though, it blends nice and easily. It's lightweight. I don't feel it on my skin. It minimizes my pores. Overall it just made my skin appear nice and smooth. It's so-so at controlling oils. I do have to blot a few times but my makeup doesn't really rub off. I get a solid 12-hr wear with this foundation. The shade I have was a bit too light but I'll definitely be looking for a better match I can add to my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Where to start! This foundation has so many great things about it. Itu2019s The packaging and presentation is very chic. Youu2019re able to use what you need without any waste. The texture of this foundation feels so light and airy , while delivering a beautiful, non cakey full coverage that does in fact last for hours! Without using any primer I should add!  It didnu2019t oxidize at all. It didnu2019t u201cfeelu201d full coverage which was great! And I noticed the huge selection of shades with different undertones - I was suprised at how many shades !  I will definitely continue to use this foundation and so recommend that if you have the chance to try it - buy it!  A little bit goes a long way also- both with blender and brush!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 56S Rich Sand - deeper skin with warm, golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is excellent! It is a smooth application and looks great on my skin.  It settles in nicely and has a beautiful finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Amazonian Clay had amazing coverage! A tiny bit of foundation offers so much coverage. It goes on flawlessly leaving my face looking amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the finish of this foundation it goes on so seamlessly almost like you have nothing on at all. Did receive totally complimentary in exchange for my honest review I will definitely make this a part of my makeup staples if you haven't tried its a must try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice foundation and it does feel like mousse and is light on the skin which I really liked. I would say it does have a soft matte finish but because of I have oily skin, after wearing the foundation for several hours my oils come through and the finish is more satin. The foundation claims to not crease but I did have creases form at my smile line (but this happens with all my foundation). I would say it has a high coverage, but I wouldn't call it full because I still had to used concealer to cover some blemishes. The foundation does oxidize from when I first applied it and the colors were not as I expecting as they do not match the models on the tarte website. I had three foundations that were suppose to be neutral but I thought that only one was truly neutral(12N). The second one was more warm orange(14N) and the third one was more peachy pink(18N). I would still recommend this foundation because it sits well on the skin and the coverage is good, but you need to find your shade. In the photo it goes from left to right 12N, 14N, 18N and the swatch from top to bottom is 12N, 14N, 18N and the swatches has been on my arm for a while and has oxidized already.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 56S Rich Sand - deeper skin with warm, golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After years of trying one foundation after another, be it powder or liquid, long last or donu2019t last, light to full coverage, for my oily skin, I finally found the right one for me. I am 38 years old and this foundation matches my oily skin well. It last up to 12-14 hours and never cakes. I donu2019t need to use primer to last that long. My oily skin is controlled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange, for my honest review from Buzz agent. I was pleasantly surprised when I received this product, because I actually received three different shades and a brush. All three shades were complementary of one another, and work perfectly at blending the perfect contour. The consistency of this product is very smooth and creamy. Itu2019s easily blend double and leaves a very flawless finish on the skin. When using this product, use a little bit because in this case, a little goes a long way. I like to dab a couple pearls sized drops on my hand and use the brush to buff onto my skin. It doesnu2019t leave your skin looking heavy or thick, but flawless. I didnu2019t notice any kind of fragrance to this product which is nice. Went to, but I would use is to put on a illuminating serum underneath to give yourself more of a glow. Just that little extra can kick things up a notch! Overall, I really love this product and will totally be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation applies smoothly and is a good color match for me. The problem is it oxidizes a terrible orange after 4 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! If I could change 2 things, I would remove the fragrance and add SPF. Other than that, I really like the full coverage and the long lasting effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tarte Amazonian clay 16-hour full coverage foundation is the best I've ever tried. It really last 16 hours actually longer than that because I fell asleep  by mistake and woke up still fully covered! Its light weight and you don't need alot so a little really does go a long way. It not only covered up my dark spots and blemishes but it also stopped the shine and improved my skin's clarity and texture while it hydrates and reduces flakiness. The Tarte Amazonian clay is my new FAVORITE full coverage make up for sure and I definitely recommend it to anyone who's looking for full light weight coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this foundation. It has a good coverage, blends easily and lasts very long on the skin. It has a matte finishes and made my skin look airbrushed. The price is decent but you get a lot of product. I also like the large kabuki brush that made application a breeze. I will continue to use this product and recommend it to friends.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 57N Rich Neutral - very deep skin with a balance of warm & cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It provides full coverage, and I only need to apply once. I really like that! it doesnu2019t rub off during the day especially with a setting spray. Iu2019m not going back to what I was using before lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m honestly happy with the selection of shades and that itu2019s full coverage and not heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation is very good, it has full coverage but it oxidizes a lot; So I recommend buying one shade less. The packaging is beautiful and practical because you can use every last drop of the product and it doesn't have any kind of odor. I recommend it if you're looking for something full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Tarte Amazonian Clay 16-Hour Full Coverage Foundation Color: 47H Tan-Deep Honey - tan to deep skin with warm, peach undertones; to try for free in exchange for my honest review. I adore this foundation because it gives my skin an even tone, no redness and blend in very well around my eyes. Although applying it is simple, I advise against doing it excessively. In all honesty, I feel younger because you can see the difference.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 20N Light Neutral - light skin with a balance of warm & cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually LOVE tarte products and I regularly use shape tape, with foundcealer. My only issue with the clay foundation was the scent. Its overpowering but thankfully dissipates once it's fully applied. The coverage is so awesome, especially for my rosacea. Make sure you prep the skin first otherwise you will see texture on the skin because it's a bit dry clay based. I loved that a little goes a long way, esp applied with the amazing kabuki brush. I am definitely switching my foundation to this one as the foundcealer makes my skin oily after a few hours. I would recommend this to anyone with uneven skin tones,or rosacea. LOVE LOVE LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ill start by saying that if you only use a little of this, it's ok. Too much and it quickly feels heavy and looks cakey. Its probably on par with the original shape tape foundation but just be ware it is very full coverage. Has good lasting power and didn't break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. Itu2019s so easy to blend and build even tho you wont need much because its full coverage and you only need a little bit. Didnu2019t breakout my skin and thats so relieving when using a new foundation. I recommend it 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s wonderful for people who have oily skin. The coverage is full and it doesnu2019t feel heavy during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with this Tarteu2019s Amazonian clay foundation. I just need a dot or pea sized quantity on my finger to put it on my face. I use the foundation brush to apply it all over my face in circular motion. It does not look caky nor I see any creasing. I have some lines on my forehead but this foundation covers it up so well and also covers up all the scars I have. Itu2019s of great quality. Covers up all the imperfections and redness. reviews.review_title: An ambitious foundation that doesn't deliver...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I was very excited to receive my Tarte Amazonian clay 16-hour full coverage foundation because I love Tarte and I love a full coverage application I don't have to worry about for the rest of the day!  I was DELIGHTED when I received three different shades to try out to see which would be the best color for my skin since I am mixed and have trouble finding my exact shade with any line. So with over 40 shades to choose from--I was stoked!   Now. This is where my excitement died. I opened the boxes of each one and was worried as soon as I saw the bottles. If they were clear and indicated the shade at first glance, I just knew none of them were going to work. The shades were WAY OFF. Like, they were not even remotely close to the sample color on the computer screen that was presented to me. I even held it up to the screen to compare. These shades are at least two or even three shades LIGHTER than depicted on what I saw. Here on Sephora site it looks a bit different. The darkest shade still made me look like a ghost. I was very disappointed.   I give stars though to the coverage itself. Had it been my actual shade I think I would have really liked it. It really covered well. I just had to add my other foundation on top of it. : /  But let me talk about that buttery blending brush! I am OBSESSED with it. So that also deserves some stars. That brush felt so soft and amazing on my skin and it blended rather well. I will be using that brush daily from now on.  So all in all--I would be open to seeing my actual shade. But it would be a challenge to determine what that even is without going to a store.

reviews.review_title: Solid foundation with a little meh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation, I tried both 56S (Rich Sand) and 51S (Deep Sand).   The foundation is very thick, it's in a paste form so like pastey clay so to speak. A little goes a long way, no joke, don't over do it, it is intensely, full coverage.   I LOVE the bamboo fiber brush that came with it. It gives a smooth and well covered application process and leaves a smooth finish.   Individually, both colors didn't match my skin tone, I made it work by mixing it together, now it's a tad difference. The main issue I come across with some foundation is, despite having yellow undertones, I end up with those that leaves almost a gray coverage, it's hard to explain but I then use my concealer with a little more color, to give it life lol.   Since the foundation boasted on 16hrs of coverage, I decided to test it for 13hrs before tapping out. While I didn't need to reapply or powder my face, I had to touch up oil all over my face twice, after the first 4 hours and then 3 hours after that. There is a small and barely noticeable separation around the most oily part of the face by hour 6 but everything else stayed intact.   Overall, pretty solid foundation that didn't settle in all my crease lines. Love it and definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for at least two weeks and already have tossed out my Clinique and store brands to just use this foundation. Less is more! Full coverage means full coverage here. You save money too because you really only need a small amount of product which is a bonus! I love the tarte face brush with is. A beauty blender I was not a fan of with this foundation but their brush is amazing! Wears well, not creasing or Caking. Smells really fresh but not perfume smell which is another bonus! I do recommend this foundation and am thrilled to have been chosen to share my thoughts for Tarte through BzzAgent to do a review and received this makeup for free. I love that the foundation stays put. My Clinique which I love however did transfer which was not great. Thia 16 hour wear however stays! I love it!!!! Thank you Tarte and BzzAgent for the free products in exchange for my honest review. I can honestly say we have a winner here and I am thrilled!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy it is to apply and the great coverage. It covers dark spots, blemishes, redness etc. My skin look amazingly smooth and it lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for over a week and it was the first time I'd tried using a non-liquid foundation and it is honestly the best thing ever. It blended really well and gave me COMPLETE coverage that I was looking for. It had a high quality feel to it and wasn't too heavy either. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that hasn't tried it and will be making it my new foundation

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 27S Light-Medium Sand - light to medium skin with warm, golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation gives a full coverage.  It feels smooth and lightweight on the skin. It doesn't feel heavy after applying the foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

It is full coverage though. I really wanted to like it since I had heard good things about this foundation. However I did love the brush. I would recommend this to someone with oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the applicator that came along with this foundation. It feels so great on my face and has a very delightful fragrance. It pairs really nice with this lightweight foundation and applies evenly across my face. I'm always searching for the perfect level of coverage that lasts through the day, cleans off nicely and doesn't irritate my skin, and I strongly believe I've found it with this product. The range of options for skin tones is great. I'm able to move between the three I received fairly easily while still creating a natural look. The only downside was that after about half a day or so, I started noticing more shine on my face. It's easily covered with a complementary powder so not a deal breaker for me. I'd recommend this foundation to anyone looking for great coverage. Tarte products are cruelty-free for anyone looking for that bonus add, although I've read that the parent company is not.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 37H Medium-Tan Honey - medium to tan skin with warm, peach undertones

reviews.review_text: Tarte Amazonian clay 16-hour full coverage foundation in  37H medium-tan honey is my new favorite foundation! It provides full coverage and hides imperfections.  You only need a dime sized amount and once you buff it in, it is very natural looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 37H Medium-Tan Honey - medium to tan skin with warm, peach undertones

reviews.review_text: The 16 hr full coverage Tarte Amazonian clay foundation was everything I have heard it was and more. It was given to me to try for my honest opinion, and I am totally in love. It is not cake like or heavy, very light weight on skin skin, like nothing is there. The product doesn't settle in fine lines and exaggerate them. I have really enjoyed using this foundation. It is well worth the try, and I will be buying this in the future. It works great for a full coverage foundation.

reviews.review_text: I can genuinely say that this foundation is the best one ive tried so far. So i have super dry and sensitive skin around this time especially. I also have acne prone skin so finding a foundation that doesnt make it worse isnt easy to find but this one is magical. Like i only have to use a little bit and it gives me full coverage, but still feels like im not wearing anything, and feels like moisturizer on my skin. I use my finger to apply it and then i go over with the buffing brush and im done. Another thing is that although is gives you full coverage it still looks natural and give you that healthy skin look. It also soothes my skin which is amazing and i wasn't expecting that. It does last all day like it says and comes off pretty easily with a makeup remover without having to wash the face multiple times. The bottle is so cute i had to mention that like the wood cap looks so fancy and cute on my makeup desk. Im honestly hooked and will be using it and stick with it for a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so pleased with how well this works. This is my new favorite foundation. I love how easily it blends. It feels smooth on my face. I will definitely buy this when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I tried this product it went on smooth, the brush was soft and applied great. The color matched my skin perfectly and blended well. I would recommend Tarte Amazonian Clay 16-hour full coverage foundation to anyone looking for a new foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this foundation. It goes on the skin smooth and does not feel tacky or too thick. However I do have really oily skin. Half way through the day all of the oil was showing right through this foundation. It doesn't transfer easily, which I liked but when it came to touching up throughout the day it became cakey. It did have good coverage. It covered scars and dark spots on my face. I think this foundation would be better suited for those who have more normal, less oily skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 32S Medium Sand - medium skin with warm, golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This might be my new favorite foundation!! It blends seamlessly into the skin and gives me the coverage I need without looking too heavy! I like how matte it is because it helps with my oily skin without making it dry and patchy! Totally recommend this foundation to everyone, especially those that have oily skin!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 14N Ivory - fair skin with a balance of warm & cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just want to start off my saying how generous it was for tarte to send not only one foundation shade but THREE! As well as the softest foundation brush I have ever touched in my life. The three shades I received were 12N, 14N, 18N. For 12N, it is very light, I am quite fair skinned but this was a little lighter than my natural shade but it works great under my eyes to brighten up the area and on red marks from acne to hide the redness. 14N was a shade darker than me but I used it as a way to naturally darken my cheeks to do a makeshift contour. And I think 18N was nearly a perfect match for me. The color swatches on my hand are in order from bottom to top being 12N, 14N, and 18N. The formula is soft and smooth, it blends easily, doesnu2019t look cakey, gives good coverage,it has a scent; not overpowering but like a light perfume scent. Just saying that for anyone whou2019s sensitive to fragrance. But overall I do recommend this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started to use in this product, not long ago and I can say that the coverage is fantastic. I use a a very small amount, and it will cover my whole face even an out any discolorations and making my skin look flawless.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25H Light Honey - light skin with warm, peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation, it stayed on all day and felt good on my skin. I recommend this to anyone trying to find a clay foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of this foundation! It is light but goes on with good coverage. There is a slight fragrance to it put I think it is a pleasant smell. I wore this into the city for work on a 12 hour day and it stayed pretty well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation. It looks beautiful on the skin, itu2019s very matte and gives a flawless look to your skin. It lasted all day on my skin and didnu2019t feel too drying.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 25H Light Honey - light skin with warm, peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of this foundation! I like that it is lightweight and it lasts all day. I love that I do not need to reapply. It gives a matte finish. My skin looks smoother and it is able to cover my blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review comes from a professional makeup artist with years of experience in the field. This is by far the best full coverage foundation with matte finish I've ever tried. The formula is so airy and lightweight, a little goes a long way so please do NOT use a lot! I see a lot of reviews that say it looks caked and that's because you are not using it right. You literally need a dime size for a full face. Less is more! The coverage is beautiful, it literally diminish the pores and it looks like the most natural filter! If you have dry skin, mix with a drop of a hyaluronic based serum like the Glow Recipe Drops. It lasts all day long!! Looks amazing on camera and in person. If you have texture skin or skin issues, again, use less so it doesn't look cakey and set with translucent powder! Chef's kiss!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tarte Amazonian Clay 16-Hour Full Coverage Foundation is the perfect foundation for everyday were.  This foundation is great. I got it in the shade 32S  medium sand.  I wear makeup almost everyday and a long wear foundation is a necessity.  I do also tend to prefer full coverage foundation, but a product that feels lightweight yet looks flawless is a must.  And this product does just that for me.  It does provide full coverage, but yet feels lightweight and breathable.  I also love how easy it is to apply.  It blends very nicely, and the finish is flawless.  I use the Tarte Buffer Airbrush Finish Foundation Brush for it and definitely recommend getting both product. Great foundation all around.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 26N Light-Medium Neutral - light to medium skin with a balance of warm & cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure why this foundation doesnu2019t have better reviews, but I absolutely love it. I have been using a different foundation for years and was hesitant to make a switch, but I am glad I did. This foundation leaves my skin looking so smooth and radiant. It provides great coverage and does not look cakey or heavy. I absolutely love the brush as well, it makes application so easy and flawless without any streaks. 100% recommen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. If you want perfect full coverage foundation then this is for you !! Iu2019m in love .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is literally flawless. Or at least it makes my skin look like it is. Itu2019s super light and airy and it makes you feel like youu2019re not wearing make up at all. I really love the brush that came with it also. Itu2019s a perfect way to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this was gonna be a good  rand considering it's tarte.  After using it for several days, it made my skin oily and it wasn't even 100%coverage , by the end of the day it was already worn off compared to my $12 bottle I normally use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 51N Deep Neutral - deep skin with a balance of warm & cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has amazing coverage! a little goes a very long way so use it sparingly. The texture is light weight and blends like a dream! new favorite foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for my opinion and the finish is great it goes on pretty smoothly with the brush that they gave me.  Be careful if you have a lot of spots like me to not overdo it because then it looks very cakey

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 37H Medium-Tan Honey - medium to tan skin with warm, peach undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so HAPPY with this Tarte Amazonian clay 16-hour full coverage foundation! My pores are usually like craters on my face but now you can hardly see them! It lasts all day, and thereu2019s no hint of oily shine. I appreciate that it looks so natural too - not at all cakey. Excellent foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I wear foundation I love a full coverage product. I have freckles and liked to cover them. This product did that for me. A little definitely goes a long way! Just a small dot of the foundation for my entire face and my freckles were gone. The only downside is itu2019s a little thick. So you have to be sure to blend really well. I would recommend this product if you like full coverage foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 18N Fair-Light Neutral - fair to light skin with a balance of warm & cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tarte Amazonian Clay foundation was an answer to my prayers, it gives great full coverage with only one layer, it has a light and smooth almost mousse like texture, it doesn't contain any weird chemicals that irritate my skin, it doesn't feel oily or dry, it doesn't even feel like i'm wearing make-up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had the privilege of trying this product after eyeing it for years. My only regret is not buying it sooner because when I tell you how great my skin felt after application, youu2019ll want to try it too. Iu2019m fortunate enough to not have many skin issues (after yearssss of struggling) so I was able to experience this foundation and see great results. It did settle into my fine lines but every foundation or product Iu2019ve tried usually does so itu2019s just something that comes with the territory. I ended up accidentally wearing it for a little over 16 hours and the only separation I noticed was the sides of my nose which is an oil machine. Either way, the product performed behind my original expectations and I truly look forward to having this remain a staple in my makeup routine. Way to go Tarte!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to find that I was going to receive this foundation. And when I opened it and saw I got THREE of them to try in different shade, along with a beautiful brush to apply it! I love this foundation, it is a little thicker than a liquid- and it lasts long. Love this and will repurchase!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 39B Medium-Tan Beige - medium to tan skin with cool, pink or rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice finish but you only need to use a little bit of the product or else you end up looking cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this foundation. It really does what it says. Flawless. It applies so nice and smoothly. I didnu2019t get any separating or drying out like some other foundations. It lasted way longer than I expected as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all tarte products but this foundation is my favorite it's super lightweight and full coverage would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been giving this a try for a week now. Love the great coverage, and it works well with my dry-ish skin. The color blends perfectly.

reviews.review_title: A little bit goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging of these for one. I was a little skeptical about foundation products because I am particular about the types I use. But these are definitely full coverage and lightweight. I could have chosen a different color but the color match is pretty close. I think itu2019s a decent product and goes well for many different skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation if you have younger or oily skin. Probably not good for more mature skin. It is mattifying so do use a moisturizer before or it may look cakey. Very pigmented and long lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am always trying to find the next best full coverage and easy to apply foundation. This one is the best one yet I have used. Even with applying it with fingers it applies so smooth. The brush is the icing to the cake, it helps smooth it out and blur any imperfections & pores. I would give it 5 stars but only thing taking away the last star is the smell isnu2019t something I favor too much. Itu2019s not something that would make me stop using, but the smell probably from the clay just doesnu2019t smell fresh or natural type foundation smell. But I can deal with it with the way it makes my skin look, it also lasts long and the amount you get in a full bottle is a very generous amount and worth the price it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am super happy with this foundation.  I wear foundation daily and I think I just found my new fave. The biggest thing for me is that I have oily skin and I feel this foundation really kept  my face matte all day.  I'm fighting wrinkles and pimples at the same time and I loved how this foundation covered my skin but without feeling heavy or cakey.  The foundation went on smoothly with the brush, stayed put during my busy day and I felt confident.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who wears foundation everyday, this Tarte Amazonian Clay foundation did not disappoint. I loved the packaging and variety of shades the foundation came in. The foundation I chose matched my skin perfectly and blurred my imperfections. What I loved the most about this foundation is that a little goes a long way with this product. I would definitely recommend this foundation to all of my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation! I normally use a minimal coverage foundation and tried this which feels so incredibly light while giving full coverage. Very pleased with this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was thicker but spread well and provided good coverage. It helped hide my pores and didn't leave a drying feeling. Overall, the shade matched well and held up though I did use a setting spray. I like the wide variety of shades offered too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a full coverage long lasting foundation I put it on at 6 am, and by the time I shower I literally have to remove it as it stays put all day! The air brush brush to apply makes it look so effortless!!!! I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Tarte Amazonian Clay 16-hr Full Coverage Foundation has a nice soft matte finish. It is full coverage, long lasting and blends well. It hides my flaws & pores great. It is oil-free so it works amazing on my oily skin, no greasy or dewy look. A tiny bit goes a long way! It is dermatologist tested, non-comedogenic, cruelty free & vegan. I love the way it looks on my skin. I would recommend this to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is pretty good foundation and it doesnu2019t leave my skin looking oily after a couple hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good! Loving this product and how well it goes on. Coverage is full and stays put for most of the day. Doesnu2019t feel super heavy, yet it covers all and does exactly what it needs to do. Leaves a tiny bit of a dewy look. Would buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first trying Tarte Amazonian clay 16-hour full coverage foundation I was a little skeptical that it was going to stay on for about 16 hours. Well, I tried it out and it lasts well over the stated 16 hours which really surprised me. I actually applied it to my face when I had a little cold coming on, wiping my nose every 2 seconds. The foundation stayed on the whole day covering up my blemishes and uneven skin tone! Some of it did rub off, but not nearly as much as other 24 hour foundations that I have used. I believe that I have found my new favorite foundation! It especially worked well with Tarte's Foundation Brush which helped to apply it evenly over my skin. The foundation wasn't too oily or didn't even dry out my skin since I have sensitive combination skin which probably helped in giving me great results. Would definitely tell others who use foundation to try this product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 28G Light-Medium Golden - light to medium skin with very warm, golden or olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing compared to others Iu2019ve tried, benefits include a nice base that will last you all day, and I would totally buy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin so finding a foundation that doesn't look cakey is typically a struggle. It definitely held up to medium coverage (could also be used for full if another layer is applied) and it stayed on my face evenly from the time I applied it in the morning until I took it off at night. I'm not sure how this product works for other skin types but I HIGHLY recommend it to anyone who has combination skin. It has been a miracle for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I feel as though they changed the formula and itu2019s way better than it was before. I didnu2019t feel it on my way despite wearing it for a full 10 hours. My skin didnu2019t look caked or anything

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and with a good primer and setting spray the foundation held up well up to 12 hours. The variety of shades made it easy to color match. Buildable coverage, a little goes along way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this foundation but I don't think it lasts 16 hours. The finish is very pretty though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long long way. It offers full coverage and is very blendable. It isn't cakey and absorbs well while lasting all day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 20B Light Beige - light skin with cool, pink or rosy undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product and although it went on well when applied, it doesnu2019t last for me. About 6 hours into my day it cakes up for me. Could just be my skin but I wouldnu2019t buy it. Yes, I use a primer and setting spray as usual but it didnu2019t stand up to all day.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this foundation from tarte. I have oily/combo skin and this is oil-free which makes it a good match. It was a great shade match and it made my pores disappear. You only need a dime sized amount so this container will no doubt last me for months! It was very easy to apply with the buffer brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First let me say the packaging is gorgeous!!! Second the coverage is breathtaking! I have 3 shades that are perfect for contouring. The foundation is lightweight and easy to apply. I canu2019t wait to use it for my formal event!!!! Pics coming to my IG!!!! Complicatedove

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the softness of this Clay it does last all day but tends to get cakey looking around your more oily spots. Make sure to try and get it as close to your skin tone. I used 20 n and I looked very pale and I have fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very creamy. It's very pigmented and the color stay put all day. In the first use, it stayed blochy on my pores but I used a primer and the problem was gone. I loved how it settles in my skin and it looks natural not cakey. I love and recommend this.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your collection.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple of days it has full coverage for 16hr, its awesome. I will totally recommend to frieu00f1ds and family. Thau00f1k you for the free sample buzzworthy.

reviews.review_title: A must have for your makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was shocked at the blend and coverage of this product. My skin tone is hard to match as Iu2019m mixed race and this was spot on u2026 so pleased with the application and the foundation buffer. Itu2019s soft and breathable as well . I suffer from large pores and some redness and this did magic on my skin . Invest in this line you will love it so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is great for me.  I've been wearing 16N in a different Tarte foundation  and the amazonian clay is different - 20N is a better color match for me and the other one is a thin liquid whereas the Amazonian Clay is...fluffy?  Hard to describe!  It's airy and almost goes on like whipped cream.  It spreads easily and covers everything from under my eye (blues) to blemishes (reds) and everything in between.  I don't feel like the 16 Hours is quite there.  I have oily skin and found my flush/redness showing through after only a few hours, but I reapplied and went back to looking flawless.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 44S Tan Sand - 44S tan sand
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I used it with their new brush and it applied like a dream. The color match is almost perfect, though, but it may just be the winter season getting to my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample from bzzagent and Tarte of an Amazonian clay 16hour full coverage foundation in return for my honest use and review. The brush that came with the foundation is impeccable, the bristles are so delicate and spread the foundation evenly. Making you feel like a million bucks, gentle and so light. Matches my skin tone to a T, very nice fluffy, mousse formula, definetly lasts all day. You feel like you have nothing on. I highly recomend it and will be using it from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample. I have never worn this product before so I can not compare to the u201colderu201d one but so far I love it. I did have to mix 2 different shades to get my exact color. (Which is normal) the buffer brush is absolutely amazing . Itu2019s so soft and moved the product around so smooth. Do not forget to moisturize prior to using or it will be too hard to move around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a fan of this foundation, it doesnt blend well and felt ashy. My skin felt tight and next day i noticed some breakouts which was disappointing. I only gave 2 stars is because the brush that came with it is really nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation as a sample and I absolutely love it. Full coverage, lasts almost all day. I have really oily skin and this last 15 hours before I got shiny which has never happened with any other foundation Iu2019ve tried. 10/10!!!
